title: A Night at the Roxbury Sounds
creator: DeadlyFastApps

extendedInfo.description: A Night at the Roxbury Soundboard!Featuring sound clips from the SNL hit movie starring Will Ferrell and Chris Kattan! App features:* Over 50 sounds from the movie!* Set sounds as ringtones, notification tone or as alarm tone!* Allows user to export app to SD card!* Share the app with your friends!Note:* To set a sound as a ringtone, notification tone or an alarm tone simply hold down a button.* If you need any kind of support please visit our website!Permissions fully explained:* FULL INTERNET ACCESS- For displaying small banner advert* MODIFY/DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS- For saving ringtones to the SD card* MODIFY GLOBAL SYSTEM SETTINGS- For setting up ringtonesA Deadly Fast Apps 2012 Production.A Night at the Roxbury is produced by SNL Studios and is property of Paramount Pictures.No copyright infringement intended.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this app every since it was announced and I must say it did not disappoint! A1 from DFA
reviews.author: A Google User
